Video

The Swarmer is a result of experiment with damned robotics to create a functional transformer. It has three forms :Rover,boat and a helicopter. And,it went well. But you have to be careful in the boat form,because it's easy to destroy it when turning.
It uses Damned robotics,B9 aerospace pack and Firespitter parts.

That's awesome! I haven't tried Damned Robotics, but it looks like a lot of fun.
That's pretty cool! I need to try this now.
This is incredible. I can see I'm going to have to start playing around with Damned Robotics, though I'm not sure I'm imaginative enough to come up with anything this impressive.
Have the front and back wheels rotate different directions to maintain balance and you shold be able to deploy them in flight.

Have the front and back wheels rotate different directions to maintain balance and you shold be able to deploy them in flight.

Definetly gonna try that in Swarmer II,but that will be far more advanced version
